content:
In this book, a man named Jack is on a mission to find young children with unique genetic traits that make them naturally talented at playing football. He is aided by an artificial intelligence that has access to DNA data from around the world, and together they scour the globe for the most promising young players.

As Jack travels from country to country, he encounters families who are reluctant to let their children go, but he is relentless in his pursuit of the perfect players. Eventually, he finds a group of young kids who have the physical abilities he is looking for and begins training them intensively.

As the years pass, Jack's players become the best in the world, and they are highly sought after by international football clubs. But at what cost? The children have been taken from their families and forced to sacrifice their childhoods in pursuit of success on the field.

As Jack's players become international stars, they begin to question the sacrifices they have made and the true cost of their success. Will they be able to find happiness and fulfillment, or will they forever be trapped in a world of ruthless competition and exploitation?
